sentence.Network_en: Old people often try to economize on heating, thus endangering their health.
sentence.Network_cn: 老年人常常想方设法节约用暖气，结果损害了他们的健康。

sentence.Network_en: I'd rather economize on clothes than food.

entry.def: If you economize, you save money by spending it very carefully.

example.ex: We're going to have to economize from now on...
example.tran: 从现在开始，我们不得不节约开支。

example.ex: Hollywood has been talking about economizing on movie budgets.
example.tran: 好莱坞一直在讨论紧缩电影预算。

sentences.sentence: "I try to economize my spare time"
"conserve your energy for the ascent to the summit"

means.word_mean: 2. spend sparingly, avoid the waste of;

sentences.sentence: "The less fortunate will have to economize now"

auth_sentence.content: Your father wants us to economize He's getting worried about the new taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your father wants us to economize He's getting worried about the new taxes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your father wants us to economize He's getting worried about the new taxes.

auth_sentence.content: But the rising price of copper, the main component of bronze, has forced more and more sculptors to economize.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the rising price of copper, the main component of bronze, has forced more and more sculptors to economize.

sentences.en: The management decided to economize by cutting the dead wood from the workforce,thus reducing the wages bill.
sentences.cn: 资方决定节省开支,裁减劳动力中的冗员,这样可以减少工资支出。

sentences.en: They set up an influential committee to advise workers on how to economize in food.
sentences.cn: 他们成立一个强有力的委员会来劝告工人们节约用粮。

sentences.en: We’ve economized as much as possible,but to little great avail,since we still owe a lot of money.
sentences.cn: 我们尽可能节俭,但没什么用,因为我们仍然欠了一大笔债。

sentences.en: If you’re poor you have to economize.
